welcome.subject: Hello {name}
welcome.text:
Welcome to {platformName}!

We are excited to have you on board. Our platform helps streamline the way spaces are booked and managed.

Start exploring with our {howToGuideLink} to make the most of your experience.

spaceEventPermissionRequestCreated.subject: Your Event Proposal is Submitted
spaceEventPermissionRequestCreated.text:
Hi {name},

Your proposal has been submitted successfully! The community reviewers for {spaceName} will review your proposal and you will receive results in {timeoutAt}.

You can check the status of your proposal through your {eventDashboardLink}.

spaceEventPermissionRequestApproved.subject: Your proposal has been approved
spaceEventPermissionRequestApproved.text:
Hi {name},

Your proposal for {eventTitle} has been approved!

{permissionResponseSummary}

You can resolve the request from {resolveLink} and submit the permission code to the booking platform {externalBookingLink} to finalize your booking.
You can also check the details on your {eventDashboardLink}.
spaceEventPermissionRequestApproved.html:
Hi {name},

Your proposal for {eventTitle} has been approved!

{permissionResponseSummary}

You can resolve the request from Permission Request Resolve page and submit the permission code to the booking platform Booking Platform to finalize your booking. You can also check the details on your Event Dashboard.

spaceEventPermissionRequestRejected.subject: Your Proposal Has Been Reviewed
spaceEventPermissionRequestRejected.text:
Hi {name},

Thank you for submitting your proposal for {eventTitle}. After careful review, the proposal was not approved this time.

{permissionResponseSummary}

We encourage you to review the feedback provided by the reviewers and submit a new proposal. We're excited to see how your ideas evolve and hope you’ll try again soon!
You can also check the details on your {eventDashboardLink}.

spaceEventPermissionRequestReviewComplet.subject: Review Completed
spaceEventPermissionRequestReviewComplet.text:
Hi {name},

The review for **{eventTitle}** is now complete!

{permissionResponseSummary}

Thank you for your time and effort in supporting the review process. Your contributions help ensure that events align with our community values and run smoothly.

You can view the details on the {communityDashboardLink}. We truly appreciate your involvement and look forward to your continued participation!
